body_html:
I tried to find the libs in my manual build directory but they seem to be generated in an intermediate step during the manual build and then deleted afterwards. Can you confirm that is the case? If so, I can try to find where they are deleted during the manual build.
…
Sent from my iPhone
On Nov 18, 2017, at 10:17 PM, peterjc123 ***@***.***> wrote: @ankur6ue Why don't you link against ATen.lib (or in 0.2.0 TH.lib, THC.lib and ATen.lib)? Although it's not included in the package now, you can get it through manual build. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
I tried to find the libs in my manual build directory but they seem to be generated in an intermediate step during the manual build and then deleted afterwards. Can you confirm that is the case? If so, I can try to find where they are deleted during the manual build. 

Sent from my iPhone

> On Nov 18, 2017, at 10:17 PM, peterjc123 <notifications@github.com> wrote:
> 
> @ankur6ue Why don't you link against ATen.lib (or in 0.2.0 TH.lib, THC.lib and ATen.lib)? Although it's not included in the package now, you can get it through manual build.
>
